subject: [Radiance-general] The sub-4K second benchmark barrier...
body:
I haven't benchmarked the "official 3.8" binaries on the G5, G4, or
Intel as yet, but I should get around to that and post the results.
I don't know what I might have done, offhand, to improve the
performance over last year's entries.

-Greg
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] The sub-4K second benchmark barrier...
